name: Hamirpur
description: Hamirpur is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its educational institutions, temples, and scenic beauty. The district is famous for its traditional festivals and the Sujanpur Tira Fort.
summary: A perfect blend of education, culture, and nature

locations.name: Sujanpur Tira Fort
locations.description: Historic fort known for its murals and architectural beauty.

locations.name: Deotsidh Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Baba Balak Nath, known for its religious significance.

locations.name: Nadaun
locations.description: Historic town known for its temples and scenic views of the Beas River.

locations.name: Awadevi Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Awadevi, known for its architectural beauty.

locations.name: Galore Wildlife Sanctuary
locations.description: Protected area known for its diverse flora and fauna, offering trekking opportunities.
